sentences.en: A blizzard was blasting great drifts of snow across the lake.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪夹着大团的积雪吹过湖面。

sentences.en: Across the busy plaza, vendors sell hot dogs and croissant sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 在热闹广场的另一边，摊贩叫卖着热狗和羊角三明治。

sentences.en: Across the river the railway track ran up to the pithead.
sentences.cn: 铁轨跨过这条河直达矿井口。

sentences.en: Graham hit him across the face with the gun.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆用枪击打他的脸部。

sentences.en: He barnstormed across the nation, rallying the people to the cause.
sentences.cn: 他在全国四处游说，号召人们共赴大业。

sentences.en: He braced his shoulders as the snow slashed across his face.
sentences.cn: 雪花如刀割般刮在他的脸上，他绷紧了双肩。

sentences.en: He came across as streetwise, but in reality he was not.
sentences.cn: 他给人的印象是很适应都市生活，但实际上并非如此。

sentences.en: He gave the donkey a whack across the back with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他拿棍子朝驴背上狠狠打了一下。

sentences.en: He nosed his car across the spring.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地开车穿过了小溪。

sentences.en: He waded across the stream.
sentences.cn: 他蹚过那条小河。

sentences.en: He walked across the field.
sentences.cn: 他走过田地。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons plants across the country are heavily contaminated with toxic wastes.
sentences.cn: 全国的核武器工厂均受到了有毒废弃物的严重污染。

sentences.en: She knelt and brushed her lips softly across Michael's cheek.
sentences.cn: 她跪了下来，轻吻迈克尔的脸颊。

sentences.en: she sat across from me.
sentences.cn: 她坐在我对面。

sentences.en: the cutbacks might be across the board.
sentences.cn: 可能全面缩减。

sentences.en: the first flight across the Atlantic
sentences.cn: 跨越大西洋的首次飞行

sentences.en: The fridge door was open and food was scattered across the floor.
sentences.cn: 冰箱门开着，食物散落在地板上。

sentences.en: The snails are no larger than one centimetre across.
sentences.cn: 这些蜗牛体宽不超过1厘米。

sentences.en: There's a bank right across the street.
sentences.cn: 街对面就有一家银行。

sentences.en: There’s Brendan. Why don’t you go across and say hello?
sentences.cn: 那是布伦丹，你为什么不去打个招呼呢？

sentences.en: They hurtled across the line in a flat-out sprint.
sentences.cn: 他们拼命冲刺，越过终点线。

sentences.en: They ran straight across the road (=  without stopping  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们径直跑过了马路。

sentences.en: They sprawl at ease across the sofa, arms draped over the back.
sentences.cn: 他们惬意地躺在沙发上，胳膊搭在后面。

sentences.en: We can gain some time if we cut across this field.
sentences.cn: 我们如果抄近路穿过这片田野可以省下一些时间。

sentences.en: We gazed across the valley.
sentences.cn: 我们向山谷另一边凝望。

sentences.en: We ran across some old friends in the village.
sentences.cn: 我们在村里偶然碰见了一些老朋友。

sentences.en: We’d got halfway across before Philip realized he’d left his money at home.
sentences.cn: 我们走到半路，菲利普才意识到他把钱忘在家里了。

sentences.en: We’ll have to swim across.
sentences.cn: 我们得游过去。

phrases.tran_cn: (澳)明了，洞悉（问题或情境的详情，复杂性）

trans.tran_cn: 从一边到另一边，朝，向，在对面，…宽，横写的
trans.tran_en: on the opposite side of something

trans.tran_cn: 穿过，横过，朝向特定的方向，在对面，在…上，遍及，超越
trans.tran_en: from one side to the other side of sth
